name: Gift or Coal
description:
You play the role of Santa and you have to deliver the gifts in the remaining time.

 But the main thing is that each child gets what he should: for those who behaved badly - coal, and for those who behaved well - gifts.

*Play on full screen!

⌨️Controls ⌨️

Mouse / finger control, if on the phone. Choose what to give to the child - coal or a gift

By Infernal Brushes 🖌 Teamlead/Gamedesign

The_BlokA#7603

Code by

Farid and atennop#1876

Art by

(IW/2DArt) Алина Бурова#8794, Nikita_Glazkov#5420,G1G4D0D1K#7797 and Uucyc#4901

Music and Sounds

George Sotnikov#7059 - Sound
Dogichevskiy#9147 - Music

Also, characters from: Adventure Time, Rick and Morty, Harry Potter, Batman, Grinch, Star vs. the Forces of Evil, Naruto, Pinocchio were added as a reference.
